12.21.18  2:01 pm   12.20.18  7:55 pm sorry for the confusion. here's my question: isn't it innacurate to call B E F A Bmin7 (b5) since that chord symbol doesn't account for the 11 in the chord?

      would something like Bmin7 (11b5) be more accurate?

      also, is it typical to hear both a natural extension and the augmented extension of the same note in the same voicing (like how this chord contains both the 11 and the #11)? thanks

12.21.18  1:51 pm   hey bill, you know most people take a bit of a break this time of year right? so if you decided you wanted to ease off the gas and catch your breath for a week or so then i don't think people would mind, at the very least you shouldn't beat yourself up so much when you've been absolutely killing it for the last six months
